The Safe and Effective Use of AI in Education

This document excerpt discusses the importance of using artificial intelligence (AI) in education in a safe and effective manner. It covers topics such as safety, limitations, data protection, and implementing AI tools in educational settings. The document also highlights opportunities for AI to support personalized learning, reduce workload for teachers and leaders, and enhance digital strategies.
